Name: AID_Att_BuildingHeal_T01
DisplayName: Heals attached building 1.6% of its Max Health every 10 seconds. Does not stack.

Name: AID_Att_BuildingHeal_T02
DisplayName: Heals attached building 2.4% of its Max Health every 10 seconds. Does not stack.

Name: AID_Att_BuildingHeal_T03
DisplayName: Heals attached building 3.2% of its Max Health every 10 seconds. Does not stack.

Name: AID_Att_BuildingHeal_T04
DisplayName: Heals attached building 4% of its Max Health every 10 seconds. Does not stack.

Name: AID_Att_BuildingHeal_T05
DisplayName: Heals attached building 4.8% of its Max Health every 10 seconds. Does not stack.

Name: AID_Att_Def_AmmoSave
DisplayName: Weapons have a 23% chance to not consume ammo when fired.

Name: AID_Att_Def_CritChance_Melee
DisplayName: Increases crit rating with melee weapons by 13.

Name: AID_Att_Def_CritChance_Ranged
DisplayName: Increases crit rating with ranged weapons by 13.

Name: AID_Att_Def_CritDamage_Melee
DisplayName: Increases melee weapon crit damage by 54%.

Name: AID_Att_Def_CritDamage_Ranged
DisplayName: Increases ranged weapon crit damage by 54%.

Name: AID_Att_Def_WeaponDamage_Assault
DisplayName: Increases assault weapon and SMG damage by 15%.

Name: AID_Att_Def_WeaponDamage_Pistol
DisplayName: Increases pistol and SMG damage by 15%.

Name: AID_Conditional_Boss_DmgBonus_T01
DisplayName: +12% Damage to Mist Monsters and Bosses

Name: AID_Conditional_Boss_DmgBonus_T02
DisplayName: +18% Damage to Mist Monsters and Bosses

Name: AID_Conditional_Boss_DmgBonus_T03
DisplayName: +24% Damage to Mist Monsters and Bosses

Name: AID_Conditional_Boss_DmgBonus_T04
DisplayName: +30% Damage to Mist Monsters and Bosses

Name: AID_Conditional_Boss_DmgBonus_T05
DisplayName: +36% Damage to Mist Monsters and Bosses

Name: AID_Conditional_DamageBasedOnHealth_T01
DisplayName: Adds up to 27% bonus damage based on the percentage of your missing health.

Name: AID_Conditional_DamageBasedOnHealth_T02
DisplayName: Adds up to 40% bonus damage based on the percentage of your missing health.

Name: AID_Conditional_DamageBasedOnHealth_T03
DisplayName: Adds up to 53% bonus damage based on the percentage of your missing health.

Name: AID_Conditional_DamageBasedOnHealth_T04
DisplayName: Adds up to 67% bonus damage based on the percentage of your missing health.

Name: AID_Conditional_DamageBasedOnHealth_T05
DisplayName: Adds up to 80% bonus damage based on the percentage of your missing health.

Name: AID_Conditional_HeadShotStreak_DmgBonus_T01
DisplayName: After 5 consecutive headshots, increases weapon damage by 30% for 10 seconds.

Name: AID_Conditional_Slowed_DmgBonus_T01
DisplayName: +15% Damage to slowed and snared targets.

Name: AID_Conditional_Slowed_DmgBonus_T02
DisplayName: +22.5% Damage to slowed and snared targets.

Name: AID_Conditional_Slowed_DmgBonus_T03
DisplayName: +30% Damage to slowed and snared targets.

Name: AID_Conditional_Slowed_DmgBonus_T04
DisplayName: +37.5% Damage to slowed and snared targets.

Name: AID_Conditional_Slowed_DmgBonus_T05
DisplayName: +45% Damage to slowed and snared targets.

Name: AID_Conditional_Stunned_DmgBonus_T01
DisplayName: +20% Damage to stunned, staggered, frozen, or knocked down targets.

Name: AID_Conditional_Stunned_DmgBonus_T02
DisplayName: +30% Damage to stunned, staggered, frozen, or knocked down targets.

Name: AID_Conditional_Stunned_DmgBonus_T03
DisplayName: +40% Damage to stunned, staggered, frozen, or knocked down targets.

Name: AID_Conditional_Stunned_DmgBonus_T04
DisplayName: +50% Damage to stunned, staggered, frozen, or knocked down targets.

Name: AID_Conditional_Stunned_DmgBonus_T05
DisplayName: +60% Damage to stunned, staggered, frozen, or knocked down targets.

Name: AID_G_MeleeDmgVsFire
DisplayName: Weapon hits deal 44% bonus damage against fire elemental enemies.

Name: AID_G_MeleeDmgVsIce
DisplayName: Weapon hits deal 44% bonus damage against water elemental enemies.

Name: AID_G_MeleeDmgVsLightning
DisplayName: Weapon hits deal 44% bonus damage against nature elemental enemies.

Name: AID_G_Melee_Affliction_V2
DisplayName: +10% Weapon Damage. Causes Affliction damage for 6 seconds.

Name: AID_G_Melee_ExplodeOnCrit_V2
DisplayName: Critical hits cause an explosion, damaging enemies within 0.5 tiles for 20% weapon damage.

Name: AID_G_Melee_ExplodeOnCrit_V3
DisplayName: Critical hits with this weapon cause an explosion, damaging enemies within 0.5 tiles for 43 base damage.

Name: AID_G_Melee_OnDamageDealt_IncreaseDamage_V2
DisplayName: Hitting multiple enemies in a single swing increases damage.

Name: AID_G_OnCrit_Cold_Snare
DisplayName: Critical hits snare the target and nearby enemies by 30% for 4 seconds. Can only occur every 5 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnCrit_ShieldRegen
DisplayName: On crit regain 2.64% of damage dealt as shields.

Name: AID_G_OnCrit_SpawnEnergyProjectiles
DisplayName: Critical hits cause 7 exploding projectiles to scatter to the surrounding area. Can only occur every 3 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnHeadshot_SpawnSparkBurst_R
DisplayName: After 5 Headshots with this weapon, reduce your current health by 12.5% and deal 30-133 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.75 tile radius. Can only occur every 6 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnHitStreak_Freeze
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon 7 times causes them to freeze for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been frozen or Bosses.  Can only occur every 2.5 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnHitStreak_SpawnSparkBurst_M
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy 4 times with this weapon reduces your current health by 8% and deals 26-151 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.5 tile radius. Can only occur every 4 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnHit_ApplyHuntersMark
DisplayName: Keeping the bow drawn past max charge will fire an arrow that debuffs the target, increasing their damage taken from all sources by 20% for 10 seconds. Does not affect Bosses.

Name: AID_G_OnHit_ChargeStormKingHammer
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy empowers Meteor Slam to summon meteors that each deal 313% of weapon damage in a 0.5 tile radius. Stacks up to 7 times, summoning 1 meteor per stack. All stacks are removed on using Meteor Slam or switching weapons.

Name: AID_G_OnHit_ChargeStormKingSword
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy empowers Storm Wave to shoot a piercing wave of energy, dealing 245% of weapon damage. Stacks up to 7 times, increasing the width of the wave with each stack. All stacks are removed on using Storm Wave or switching weapons.

Name: AID_G_OnHit_Execute
DisplayName: Damage dealt to enemies below 15% health will immediately kill them.

Name: AID_G_OnHit_ShieldRegen
DisplayName: On hitting an enemy with this weapon regain 5.5% of damage dealt as shields.

Name: AID_G_OnHit_ShieldRegenAndMaxShield
DisplayName: If this weapon hits an enemy, your shield is replenished for 3% of the damage dealt and you gain 20% max shields for 8 seconds

Name: AID_G_OnHit_SlowToFreeze
DisplayName: Each hit applies a stack of slow. When an enemy reaches 10 stacks, they are frozen for 3 seconds

Name: AID_G_OnHit_Stack_StormkingAssault
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy applies a charge. Building up to 5 charges or switching targets detonates the charges, dealing 100% of weapon damage to the target and nearby enemies. Each charge increases the radius, up to a max of 0.75 tiles.

Name: AID_G_OnHit_Stun_Lovestruck
DisplayName: Keeping the bow drawn past max charge will fire an arrow that stuns the enemy for 10 seconds. Weapon damage will break this effect. Does not affect Bosses or enemies that have recently been Lovestruck.

Name: AID_G_OnImpactBreak_Dance
DisplayName: Stunning or Knocking back an enemy with this weapon causes it and nearby enemies to dance for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

Name: AID_G_OnImpactBreak_DealDamage
DisplayName: Stunning or Knocking back an enemy deals them 12 base damage.

Name: AID_G_OnImpactBreak_Freeze
DisplayName: Stunning or knocking back an enemy with this weapon causes nearby enemies to freeze for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been frozen, Mist Monsters, or Bosses. Can only occur every 1 second.

Name: AID_G_OnImpact_SpawnSparkBurst_M
DisplayName: Stunning or Knocking back an enemy reduces your current health by 8% and deals 26-149 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.5 tile radius. Can only occur every 5 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnImpact_SpawnSparkBurst_R
DisplayName: Stunning or Knocking back an enemy reduces your current health by 12.5% and deals 29-127 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.75 tile radius. Can only occur every 6 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnKill_ChainLightning
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon causes chain lightning to strike up to 6 enemies. Requires the bow to be drawn back at least halfway.

Name: AID_G_OnKill_ChainLightning_Real
DisplayName: Eliminating an enemy with this weapon causes chain lightning to strike up to 6 enemies.

Name: AID_G_OnKill_Dance
DisplayName: Eliminating an enemy with this weapon causes nearby enemies to dance for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

Name: AID_G_OnKill_SpawnRetroSciFiRing
DisplayName: Eliminating an enemy creates an expanding ring of damage. This can only occur every 4 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnKill_SpawnSparkBurst
DisplayName: Eliminating an enemy with this weapon reduces your current health by 8% and deals 26-151 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.5 tile radius. Can only occur every 3 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnKill_SpawnSparkBurst_R
DisplayName: Eliminating 3 enemies with this weapon reduces your current health by 12.5% and deals 29-129 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.75 tile radius.

Name: AID_G_OnKill_SpawnSparkBurst_R_Bow
DisplayName: Eliminating 2 enemies with this weapon reduces your current health by 12.5% and deals 29-129 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.75 tile radius.

Name: AID_G_OnKill_SpawnSteamCloud
DisplayName: Eliminating an enemy creates a damaging cloud of steam. This can only occur every 5 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnMeleeCrit_PistolHeadshotDamage
DisplayName: On crit, increase pistol headshot damage by 40% for 15 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnMeleeHitStreak_Dance
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon 3 times causes it and nearby enemies to dance for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

Name: AID_G_OnMeleeHit_StackBuff_Armor
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants +8 Armor for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Name: AID_G_OnMeleeHit_StackBuff_CritRate
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants +6 Critical Rating for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Name: AID_G_OnMeleeHit_StackBuff_Damage
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants +6% Damage for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Name: AID_G_OnMeleeHit_StackBuff_FireRate
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants +6% Attack Speed for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Name: AID_G_OnMeleeHit_StackBuff_MoveSpeed
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants +6% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Name: AID_G_OnMeleeHit_Stack_AOE_Stun
DisplayName: Every 8th hit cause a stun around the character.

Name: AID_G_OnMeleeKill_RegenShields
DisplayName: After eliminating 5 enemies with this weapon within 15 seconds, regenerate 25% of your shield over 3 seconds.

Name: AID_G_OnRangedFire_StackBuff_CritRate
DisplayName: Each shot fired grants +1.8 Critical Rating for 1 second. Stacks up to 15 times.

Name: AID_G_OnRangedFire_StackBuff_Damage
DisplayName: Each shot fired grants +1.8% Damage for 1 second. Stacks up to 15 times.

Name: AID_G_OnRangedFire_StackBuff_FireRate
DisplayName: Each shot fired grants +2.6% Fire Rate for 1 second. Stacks up to 15 times.

Name: AID_G_OnRangedFire_StackBuff_Shield
DisplayName: Each shot fired grants +3.5% Shield for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.

Name: AID_G_OnRangedHitStreak_Dance
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon 6 times causes it and nearby enemies to dance for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

Name: AID_G_OnRangedHitStreak_DanceAfflict
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon has a small chance to cause it and nearby enemies to dance and take fire affliction damage for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

Name: AID_G_OnReload_SpawnSparkBurst
DisplayName: Reloading reduces your current health by 12.5%. On the next enemy hit, deal 29-132 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.75 tile radius.

Name: AID_G_RangedDmgVsFire
DisplayName: Weapon hits deal 44% bonus damage against fire elemental enemies.

Name: AID_G_RangedDmgVsIce
DisplayName: Weapon hits deal 44% bonus damage against water elemental enemies.

Name: AID_G_RangedDmgVsLightning
DisplayName: Weapon hits deal 44% bonus damage against nature elemental enemies.

Name: AID_G_Ranged_Affliction_V2
DisplayName: +10% Weapon Damage. Causes Affliction damage for 6 seconds.

Name: AID_G_Ranged_ChainBullet
DisplayName: Bullets chain to one nearby target.

Name: AID_G_Ranged_HeadShotStreak_DmgBonus_V2
DisplayName: Getting 5 headshots in a row increases ranged weapon damage +30% for 10 seconds.

Name: AID_G_Ranged_HeadShot_BuffSwordCritRating
DisplayName: Headshot eliminations boost critical hit chance with sword attacks for 15 seconds.

Name: AID_G_Ranged_HeadShot_ExplodeOnDeath_V2
DisplayName: Headshot eliminations cause an explosion, damaging enemies within 0.5 tiles for 30% weapon damage.

Name: AID_G_Ranged_IsTargeting_DmgBuff_V2
DisplayName: +30% Weapon Damage when aiming down sights

Name: AID_G_Ranged_OnEnemyKilled_FasterReload_V2
DisplayName: +10% Reload Speed per enemy killed, up to a maximum of +50% Reload Speed

Name: AID_G_Shrapnel
DisplayName: On hit, bullet splinters into shrapnel, dealing 40% damage in a cone behind target (1.5 second cooldown).

Name: AID_G_StandStill_StackBuff_Damage
DisplayName: Standing in place for 2 seconds grants +11% Damage. Stacks up to 5 times.  Moving from that position removes the effect completely.

Name: AID_G_StandStill_StackBuff_DamageVsMist
DisplayName: Standing in place for 2 seconds grants +17% Damage vs Mist Monsters. Stacks up to 5 times.  Moving from that position removes the effect completely.

Name: AID_G_StandStill_StackBuff_GrantShield
DisplayName: Standing in place for 1 second regenerates 10% of your max shield value.

Name: AID_G_StormKingLauncherCharge
DisplayName: Charging this weapon causes the laser to split and chain to multiple targets on hitting. Longer charge times increase the number of splits, up to a max of 3. Charged shots generate more heat and consume more ammo.

Name: AID_G_StormKingPistolHomingProjectiles
DisplayName: Fires homing projectiles that seek out the target's head. Aiming down sights increases the lock-on range from 4 tiles to 12, but decreases fire rate by 50%.

Name: AID_G_TwoKillStreak_FirePool_V2
DisplayName: If two enemies are eliminated within 5 seconds of each other a pool of fire spawns on the ground.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_HitStreak_AOE_Dmg_V2
DisplayName: Landing 5 hits in a row on a single target causes a small explosion damaging enemies within 0.5 tiles of the target for 70% damage.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_Melee_OnDmgReceived_DmgBuff_V2
DisplayName: 5 attacks from enemies give you a 20% melee damage increase on your next attack.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnDmgDealt_GiveEnergy_V2
DisplayName: Damage dealt with this weapon recovers 5 energy. This can happen once every 4 seconds.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnDmgDealt_GiveShield_V2
DisplayName: Damage dealt with this weapon recovers 10% of maximum shield. This can happen once every 3 seconds.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnDmg_AfflictedEnemy_KnockbackAOE_V2
DisplayName: Hitting an afflicted target causes a small Knockback AOE around them (5s cooldown).

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnDmg_ApplySnare_V2
DisplayName: Damage dealt with this weapon snares the target by 30% for 6 seconds.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnFire_DamageStack
DisplayName: Every 10th round fired increases weapon damage by 15%, stacking up to 4 times.  Reloading removes the effect.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnHit_EnergyNova
DisplayName: After 6 hits, trigger an explosion, dealing 106% weapon damage in a 0.5 tile radius.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnKill_Spawn_Firework_V2
DisplayName: On kill: Spawn Roman Candle at enemy location (8s cooldown).

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnKill_Spawn_HealthPickUps
DisplayName: Eliminating enemies with this weapon can spawn healing candy pick ups.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnKill_Spawn_HealthPickUps_Gumdrops
DisplayName: Eliminating enemies with this weapon can spawn healing gumdrop pick ups.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnReload_DamageBuff
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants a 1.7% weapon damage and 1% reload speed increase for 2 seconds, stacking up to 25 times.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnReload_DamageStack
DisplayName: Each bullet reloaded grants a 16% damage bonus, stacking up to 5 times.  The first bullet to hit an enemy after reloading deals all of the extra damage.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnReload_Explode
DisplayName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon marks them as a target, stacking with each hit.  Upon reload each marked target explodes in a 0.5 tile radius dealing 65% of weapon damage dealt per mark applied and removes all marks from the target.

Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnShieldBreak_IncendiaryAOE_V2
DisplayName: Deals Fire damage to nearby enemies when your shield breaks

Name: AID_G_Weapon_Stun_V2
DisplayName: Increases impact by 25%. Stun duration increased by 1s.

Name: AID_G_Woosh
DisplayName: After 3 eliminations, gain +28% movement speed and +52% damage for 8 seconds.
